X = load_wn18()
model = TransE(batches_count=10, seed=0, epochs=100, k=100, eta=5,
    optimizer_params={'lr': 0.1}, loss='pairwise', loss_params={'margin': 5
    }, optimizer='adagrad')
model.fit(np.concatenate((X['train'], X['valid'])))
filter_triples = np.concatenate((X['train'], X['valid'], X['test']))
ranks = evaluate_performance(X['test'][:200], model=model, filter_triples=
    filter_triples, verbose=True)
mrr = mrr_score(ranks)
hits_10 = hits_at_n_score(ranks, n=10)
print('ranks: %s' % ranks)
print('MRR: %f' % mrr)
print('Hits@10: %f' % hits_10)
pytest.mark.skip(reason='Speeding up jenkins')
